text: Eghtɨ gɨn, apaniba izɨ nɨn adarazir gumazamiziba bar me mɨsogham, mati gumazim sabamɨn me atuzɨ moghɨn, me gumazamizir kɨnibar mɨn arɨghiregham. Eghtɨ gumazir vamɨra ikɨva ofa gamir gumazimɨn ingangarim damuam. Bizir kaba an nɨghnɨzim gasɨghasɨghtɨ, an navim bar osemeghtɨ, temeriba an damaziba aghuightɨ, da okavigham.
